reviews.customers_say: Customers find this sweater dress comfortable and well-fitting, particularly noting that the medium size is perfect. The dress is versatile, able to be dressed up or worn casually, and customers appreciate its high-quality construction and breathable fabric. They like the color options, with one customer specifically mentioning the rich olive green shade. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfy and stylish!
items.body: I love this dress and am tempted to buy more colors. It‚Äôs so easy to throw on and dress up or down. It is soft but has enough weight to be warm too. I‚Äôm 5‚Äô2‚Äù and the small fit great, not quite to my ankles but long enough to feel like a maxi dress and lays really nicely. I‚Äôd say it runs true to size, if not slightly big, but in a good and flattering way. Very cute. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Warm and comfortable!
items.body: If you love to wear dresses but get cold in the winter, you might enjoy wearing the stress as much as I do. I was afraid this sweater material might be too thin, but it‚Äôs nice and thick, but not too thick. I bought the olive green in my usual size, and it fits just how I wanted it to, not too tight but more relaxed. I‚Äôm 5 foot six, and it fell to just above my ankles. It looks cute on its own, but I added a thin belt to cinch the waist in a bit. I wore it with some brown ankle boots. I think it would be cute with flats or white sneakers too. I love the color. It‚Äôs a rich olive green that‚Äôs perfect for the fall. The dress is warm enough without making me too hot. The fabric is pretty soft, especially after washing. I washed it in cold water in a sweater bag and laid it on my drying rack. The only thing I might change is the buttons. They fit the style of the dress, but I wish they were a tad more refined. Overall, I‚Äôm happy with my purchase and would consider buying from this brand in the future. I hope this was helpful! Read more
items.author: LoriG

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Will serve it‚Äôs purpose
items.body: I purchased this dress to wear in the house during the colder months. It seems extra comfy and I love the color. Read more
items.author: K Dubya

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Get this dress, adorable
items.body: This fits true to size. I have 2 of these and love them. They are made from a great fabric, cotton blend so will go from fall to spring. The colors are exactly as pictured. So easy to wear, go with boots, sandals etc. Washes well in a laundry bag, hang to dry. I ironed mine, but you dont need to. Great dress Read more
items.author: A nana in the usa

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful and comfortable dress
items.body: I really love these dresses, I bought it in three different colors. The other two came in great new condition but this one came wadded up and stuffed down in the bag and looked to me as if it had been used or returned. I started to return it but I really didn‚Äôt want to go through all of the trouble of doing that so I did decide to keep it because it is a nice dress. I really like the color. The fit is really nice and true to size and I love that it is a longer length. I am 5‚Äô5 and it is around mid calf length. The weight of the material is not too thin or thick but really perfect. I would have given five stars if it were not for the condition that it arrived to me in. It was all wrinkled up from being just stuffed down in the bag and just didn‚Äôt look new like the other two did. I was disappointed in the condition that it arrived in. Read more
items.author: Sherri Carter

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars I would purchase more in different colors.
items.body: Fits true to size. I am 5 feet 4 inches tall and weigh 198lbs. The dress hits me right above the ankle. Washes well. Light cycle warm dryer setting. Minimal wrinkles. Very comfortable. Read more
items.author: Cheryl Tucker

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute and comfortable
items.body: I love this is so cute and comfortable. I'm 5'2" and the medium comes mid-calf in length. I wear it with some leggings and boots with a scarf around my neck whenever I go out. Read more
items.author: Coco

items.author: LORILYN LOOMIS YOUNG

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress V Neck Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress V Neck Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Brown, Pea Green, Light Apricot, Apricot, Black, Dusty Blue, Navy Blue, Orange, Brick Red, Red, Khaki, White, Red Apricot, Light Pink. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
